default.$description: Background colour for the navigation area of the Drawer.

top.$description: Background colour for the top area of the Drawer.
Text and icon colour for the CTA at the top of the Drawer.

menu.$description: Text colour for top level items in the Drawer navigation stack.

item.$description: Text colour for items in an expanded navigation submenu.

chevron.$description: Icon colour for the chevron that indicates an expandable menu item in the Drawer navigation stack.

close.$description: Icon colour for the 'Close' button in the top area of the Drawer.

default.$description: Default foreground colour for any links appearing beneath the Drawer navigation stack when in a default, inactive state.

hover.$description: Foreground colour for links appearing beneath the Drawer navigation stack when in a hovered (or focused) interactive state.

pressed.$description: Foreground colour for links appearing beneath the Drawer navigation stack when in a selected, pressed or active state.

divider.$description: Border (stroke) colour for dividers between top level menu items in the Drawer navigation stack.

default.$description: Border (stroke) colour exclusively for use in highlighting any focused interactive element in the main area of the Drawer.

top.$description: Border (stroke) colour exclusively for use in highlighting any focused interactive element in the top area of the Drawer.
